++ Object System Version Control System



+++ SUMMARY

  * System responsible for managing changes to information such as:
    * computer programs 
    * documents
    * large web sites
  
  * Version control is a component of software configuration management.
  
  * Most commonly run as stand-alone application, but is also embedded in program sometimes.
